distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for ghostscript fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-38559: Fixed out-of-bounds read in devn_pcx_write_rle() that could result in DoS (bsc#1213637).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: A buffer overflow flaw was found in base/gdevdevn.c:1973 in devn_pcx_write_rle() in ghostscript. This issue may allow a local attacker to cause a denial of service via outputting a crafted PDF file for a DEVN device with gs.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
